DOC.brief_summary: To assess posterior capsule opacification ( PCO ) patient implant either AcrySof SN60AT lens AcrySof SN60WF lens .
DOC.brief_title: Posterior Capsule Opacification ( PCO ) Evaluation AcrySof SN60AT Lens vs. SN60WF Lens
DOC.criteria: patient bilateral senile cataract Age > 50 year Fit hospital follow ups Pupils dilate > 6mm preoperatively Eyes expect see 6/12 well postoperatively Diabetes On treatment glaucoma Other ocular pathology Previous ocular surgery
